front.title: RTP with TCP Friendly Rate Control

abstract.t: This memo specifies how the TCP Friendly Rate Control (TFRC) of RTP flows can be supported using the RTP/AVPF profile and the general RTP header extension mechanism. AVPF feedback packets and RTP header extensions are defined to support the exchange of control information between RTP TFRC senders and receivers. TFRC is an equation-based congestion control scheme for unicast flows operating in a best effort Internet environment.
